subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: AZ, a Dutch club in Alkmaar, has signed the United States striker Jozy Altidore from Spain’s Villarreal to a four-year contract. AZ announced the deal on its Web site but gave no financial details.
snippet: AZ, a Dutch club in Alkmaar, has signed the United States striker Jozy Altidore from Spain’s Villarreal to a four-year contract. AZ announced the deal on its Web site but gave no financial details.
